Description:
The perfect location
Currently rented for $230 per week this "Brick Clad" property would make an ideal investment or future family home. Sitting on an allotment of approx. 700 sq metres, this 3 bedroom home has potential to refurbish and create the family home. The wide entry hall leads you to the family lounge with original fireplace. The kitchen is positioned off the lounge and has access through to the rear yard past the 3rd bedroom. The 2 front bedrooms are a good size with ornate ceilings.
The large rear yard is fenced and private with lovely established trees and plenty of room for workshop or car accommodation.
Inside features
3 bedrooms
Original kitchen and bathroom
Ornate ceilings
Outside features
Large allotment of approx. 700 sq metres
One Small garden shed (the 2nd shed is owned by the tenants)
Side access to rear yard
Located within walking distance to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Playground, parks and public transport.
Insights: 42 Morrison Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2007 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
LIGHT-FILLED ELEVATED HOME NEAR SCHOOLS
Located in a lovely street, on the Melbourne side of the city, this contemporary home is just minutes to the many amenities of Kangaroo Flat and within easy walking distance of Kangaroo Flat Primary school, Crusoe Secondary College, childcare and bus stops. Elevated on the allotment, offering a vista across the rooftops, this beautifully presented property is low-maintenance both indoors and out.
The front door opens into a wide hallway and a spacious formal lounge. Large picture windows offer a view across Kangaroo Flat, and provide plenty of natural light. Further down the hallway is an open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The modern kitchen enjoys fantastic storage and glass sliding doors open to the garden from both the dining and living areas.
A hallway from the living room leads down to the four good-sized bedrooms, three with built-in robes. The master bedroom features a large walk-in robe and an ensuite. This area of the home also includes a family bathroom, separate toilet, a large, light laundry with a sliding door to the garden; and excellent storage.
Two dedicated entertaining spaces ensure there is private outdoor space year-round. Off the dining area is a sunny courtyard, and to the rear of the home is an alfresco area with lights and power. The remainder of the allotment features garden beds and an area set to lawn.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Ceiling fan in master
Secure access from double garage to home
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, 900mm stove and five-burner gas cooktop
Door from garage to rear yard
Side access to yard
With an outstanding tenant in place, this property would be absolutely perfect for a buyer seeking an easy-care investment that is ready to go. Alternatively, with fantastic proximity to schools and move-in ready, the property would also be ideal for a young family looking for a spacious home close to it all.
Insights: 16 Freeman Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
SOUGHT AFTER STYLE IN KANGAROO FLAT.
Situated on a corner block this townhouse is sited on approx. 470 sqm allotment, this property is ideal for first home buyers/investors and has been recently refurbished. Offers; 3 bedrooms, main with ensuite and Built in robes, 2 other bedrooms with built in robes, open plan kit-meals-lounge area. The combined renovated bathroom-laundry includes shower, toilet and laundry trough, the kitchen has recently been renovated and is stunning, with new timber bench tops, new cupboards, stylish tiling and lighting, open plan lounge with double doors leading out onto a extensive outdoor timber decked entertaining area, which leads down to a garden area with 2 garden sheds and side access, ideal for trailer, boat, caravan etc. Add to the list; new floor coverings, single carport and low maintenance, this property will impress.

Description:
Ready to Build?
Located on the cornet of Furness Street and Cannon Lane, this allotment of 569 sq metres has a fantastic outlook. Build your dream home on an affordable allotment with all services available. Close to Lansell Plaza Shopping Centre and public transport, this allotment is perfect for the purchaser seeking a low maintenance home site.
- A frontage of 15.56 to Cannon Lane and another boundary of 23.29 to Furness Street, your home designs are endless
- Either commute to Melbourne in 90 minutes or jump on the train at the Kangaroo Flat train station, the options are there
- A great lifestyle is on offer with walking tracks around both Crusoe and No.7 Reservoir a lovely stroll away
- This affordable block is one you shouldnt miss out on
- Titles have been issued and ready for you to construct your new home
- All services available
- Fully Fenced
- Lot 1 - 569m2
Lots 2 & 3 are also available.

Description:
STRESS-FREE INVESTMENT OPTION
Located just a block from Bendigo Homemaker Centre and walking distance to Lansell Square and bus stops, this contemporary townhouse is also just minutes from the many amenities of Kangaroo Flat and conveniently positioned in a quiet street on the Melbourne side of the city. With a neat, easy-care front garden, the home has a wide driveway leading to the double garage, offering ample off-street parking.
The front door opens into an entry hall, leading on one side to a spacious master bedroom. This room offers a walk-in robe and ensuite, and two further bedrooms can be found at the other end of the home, both with built-in robes. This area of the property also includes a family bathroom and a large, light laundry with a door to the side of the house.
At the end of the entry hall is a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining area. The kitchen enjoys modern appliances and ample storage, and dual aspect windows provide natural light to the large room.
A glass sliding door from the lounge opens out to a good-sized alfresco space that runs across the rear of the house perfect for outdoor dining. This area overlooks a low-maintenance gravel garden with garden beds.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, wall oven and four-burner gas cooktop
Secure access from double garage to interior of home
Door from garage to rear yard
Secure gate from side of the house to rear yard
Quality tenants in place
With excellent proximity to all amenities and an easy-care yard, this modern townhouse is absolutely ideal for an investor seeking a simple buy thanks to excellent long-term tenants. Alternatively, the home would suit downsizers or professionals wanting a property that requires good interior space and no work

Description:
Spacious 3 bedroom family home complete with a scenic view
Positioned atop Kangaroo Flat, providing scenic views is this 8-year young free-flowing family home. sitting on a wide 756m² block with double side access gates to a large fully landscaped backyard. This beautiful home is suited to a variety of buyers and is not expected to last long.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms, the master with a walk-in-robe and three-piece ensuite. The remaining two generous size bedrooms both with built in robes. At the heart of the home you are welcomed to the first of two lounge spaces. Beyond you are greeted with the kitchen complete with a large island bench and a built-in oven, stove and dishwasher to suit.
The right of the home hosts the remaining bedrooms, second bathroom, laundry and linen press. The left of the formal living area provides access to the fully decked & enclosed outdoor entertaining alfresco, complete with a fantastic view.
This home truly is fit for a variety of buyers. First home buyers, investors, downsizers and entertainers alike. Property features include ducted gas heating and evaporative air-conditioning throughout, double car garage with remote access and vehicle access to yard, secure access from garage to home.
Ideally placed in an excellent school catchment, only a 7 minute drive to the Lansell Square shopping outlet and a 8 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD. Opportunity awaits! Get in touch with Toby Gray today to arrange your private inspection.
(ENOE)

Description:
Love Me Do
In a competitive market such as this it's really hard to not be disheartened when a property you love is secured by someone else ahead of you. You're likely experiencing a pressure to find and secure a property before others see it? To protect ourselves against the hurt of missing out, we try not to fall in love with a property too soon.
But we're human and well presented properties make it all the harder to keep a level head. The title for this ad points to the Beatles debut single about loyalty. Whether this is your debut into the property market as a first home buyer, you're seeking an investment property, or you desire a home for retirement; you'll quickly feel that this home will serve you incredibly well. It calls you to love it.
Its beauty is first evident in its street appeal - the neat landscaped gardens, front bay windows and attractive brick veneer construction. Inside the home reveals deeper appeal including fastidiously maintained carpets and paintwork, modern vinyl plank flooring, ceiling fans throughout, ducted evaporative cooling, split system heating and cooling and a gas heater.
The three robed bedrooms are well proportioned, there are two living areas (the second of which provides the possibility of a renovation to achieve a fourth bedroom if desired) and an ensuite. The kitchen and meals area flows beautifully to the covered outdoor entertainment area and a sunny paved area to the rear. The manageable lawn areas and neat gardens are very private and peaceful. Fruit trees include olive, nectarine, plum and apple. There is a compost area, veggie gardens and two garden sheds.
The immediate neighbourhood offers access for bushwalks, there are bus stops and a playground along Queen Street and the position here is just a short drive to the numerous offerings of Kangaroo Flat including Lansell Square, schools, medical facilities, the Kangaroo Flat Railway Station and very popular Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre.
This is a property you'll love and one that will very likely love you back with lifestyle benefits and capital gains.

Address: Unit 29 Karinya Gardens, (1 - 11 Furness Street) Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Relaxed Living in Lovely Surrounds
Karinya Gardens is a lovely 'over 55' village community in Kangaroo Flat, across the road from Harvey Norman, and only a short drive or bus ride to Centro Lansell or the Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct.
With vaulted ceilings to the lovely open-plan kitchen/family/dining, as well as having a handy light-filled craft room or study, this 2 bedroom home is a pleasure to offer to a new owner.
The kitchen is well-appointed with great cupboards, plenty of bench space, gas cooktop and electric oven. There is a split-system for heating and cooling, as well as ceiling fans to Bed 1 and the family area, giving you year-round comfort.
Outside is a single carport, garden shed and room to make a lovely secluded seating area surrounded by potted plants.
From the family room or the verandah, you can chat to your neighbours as they garden, or meet up at the clubhouse or bowling green.
Call to make a time to view today. You will appreciate the community feel that Karinya Gardens, and AVIVA offer to all their residents.

Address: Unit 29 Karinya Gardens, (1 - 11 Furness Street) Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Relaxed Living in Lovely Surrounds
Karinya Gardens is a lovely 'over 55' village community in Kangaroo Flat, across the road from Harvey Norman, and only a short drive or bus ride to Centro Lansell or the Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct.
With vaulted ceilings to the lovely open-plan kitchen/family/dining, as well as having a handy light-filled craft room or study, this 2 bedroom home is a pleasure to offer to a new owner.
The kitchen is well-appointed with great cupboards, plenty of bench space, gas cooktop and electric oven. There is a split-system for heating and cooling, as well as ceiling fans to Bed 1 and the family area, giving you year-round comfort.
Outside is a single carport, garden shed and room to make a lovely secluded seating area surrounded by potted plants.
From the family room or the verandah, you can chat to your neighbours as they garden, or meet up at the clubhouse or bowling green.
Call to make a time to view today. You will appreciate the community feel that Karinya Gardens, and AVIVA offer to all their residents.

Description:
Modern Living, Space and Location.
Modern living, space and location, good things also come in threes.
Welcome home to 15 Alder Street, a three-bedroom charmer conveniently located off High Street and nestled on a generous 934m2 block.
The 1950s cream brick abode has been beautifully refurbished throughout and offers plenty of space for the whole family with two additional versatile rooms; a study/nursery and detached studio.
Walking along the timber decked front patio and inside the front entry you're greeted by the open plan kitchen, living and meals area which beautifully combines the modern vibe with the home's original charm.
A cosy gas wood fireplace with mantle, stunning polished timber flooring and plenty of natural light sets the scene for the home's inviting nature.
The sleek gourmet kitchen is a standout with its abundance of modern cabinetry, subway tiling and 900mm Westinghouse freestanding oven.
Each bedroom is unique in design, offering either a built-in or walk-in robe, generous space, a warming colour palette and is serviced by the home's main bathroom offering all the essentials.
Outside is where the home continues to shine with the large secure backyard boasting an undercover and paved entertaining patio with barbeque area, the studio which could also be used as a teenagers' retreat and a large concreted and powered shed with mechanics pit.
Off street parking is a breeze; either park in the driveway, under the carport with its electric roller door, or take the car all the way through to the backyard.
With its large allotment, utilise the space for yourself or invest now and plan for the future with potential for subdivision (STCA).
Central to both Kangaroo Flat shops in one direction and Bendigo CBD the other, the location is a standout. Arrange your inspection today with Jesse Forbes.
Insights: 15 Alder Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Never Been Lived In - Brand New 3 Bedroom Home
A wide street frontage to Aspinall Street and sited on its own titled parcel of land measuring just under 400m2, is this perfectly located BRAND NEW, just completed 3-bedroom BV home. With all the ingredients to impress, why build when you can move straight in and enjoy everything this quaint home offers. Main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe and both other bedrooms with built-in cupboards.
Tiled bathroom, separate laundry and toilet.
The great sized open-plan kitchen/meals/family room overlooks the undercover alfresco area.
Upgrades throughout include quality window furnishings and floor coverings, and stone bench top, dishwasher and a 900mm oven in the kitchen.
Ducted heating and cooling throughout is an added bonus and convenience.
Outside you will find a double garage with remote roller door, internal access from here also. Landscaped, low-maintenance gardens which are a prized inclusion. Double gates to the rear yard with genuine side access, garden shed, just minutes to Kangaroo Flat and Golden Square amenities and opposite The Royal Freemasons newly-built aged care home.
First home buyers take advantage of the $20,000 FHB grant.
Ideally suited to retirees, couples, singles and investors.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED, QUALITY ESTABLISHED HOME
Warm and welcoming, this established and impeccably presented property sits in a quiet and peaceful court just down the road from Lansell Square, on the Melbourne side of the city. With a bus stop at the end of the street and supermarkets, cafes and shops just moments away, this timeless home is close to all amenities.
A brick build with a heritage style, the house sits behind a beautifully landscaped front garden. A wide return verandah creates a lovely entry and the front door opens into a spacious and light-filled formal lounge and dining room. Two doors at either end of the room lead through to a light and bright open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The kitchen offers ample storage and bench space, and this room overlooks the rear yard.
The master bedroom is positioned off the formal living area and this large room features a floor-to-ceiling bay window, walk-in robe, ceiling fan and ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms are located in separate wing off the kitchen area and both rooms feature built-in rooms. A family bathroom and separate toilet service these rooms and this section of the home also includes a large laundry, with a door to the rear yard.
Outdoors, a spacious, brick-paved alfresco area wraps around the rear of the house offering a fantastic space for entertaining. The low-maintenance rear garden includes raised garden beds with water tanks, a decked gazebo, garden shed and large double shed with extended area set up for a dog run and kennel. The backyard can be accessed via both sides of the home, with double gates at one side ensuring easy vehicle access to the shed.
Additional features include:
Gas ducted heating throughout
Split system cooling
Ceiling fans
Kitchen appliances including four-burner gas cooktop and oven with separate grill
Excellent storage throughout
Garden shed
Double shed
Undercover dog run
Secure access to rear yard from both sides of the house
This solid build is beautifully maintained and with minor cosmetic changes offers a fantastic option for a buyer seeking an easy-care space that provides a design and finish that offers low-maintenance family living.
Insights: 3 Lauren Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Currently with a secure 12 month tenancy!
Set in a great area of Kangaroo Flat, this tree-lined street offers privacy in a family filled community just a short distance to Bendigo's CBD.
This brilliant location is also just 5 mins to an ALDI, Chemist Warehouse and of course Lansell Square Shopping just down the road bringing you K-Mart, Bunnings, Coles and Woolworths supermarkets.
Down the back of this battle axe 501m² block, you'll find this charming weatherboard comprising of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and an enormous living area offering loads of sunlight and a stylish black fireplace bringing an extra touch of character. The home has gas heating as well as air conditioning for the summer months.
The kitchen and dining area is an open plan space and directly connects to the back sunroom/second living area which could make for a perfect study nook area or kids play area.
The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances, including electric stove and oven, a dishwasher and bench space for easy meal preparation.
Outside is a fantastic undercover alfresco area, so perfect for hosting BBQ nights with friends and family plus there's plenty of room for the kids to play outside.
The property is currently leased until mid 2021 for $270/PW

Description:
Mud Brick Cottage on 3/4 acre adjoining Regional Park
A part of Bendigo's past has come onto the market, with this unique home, adjoining Bendigo Regional Park and forest area.
Historically, the cottage was built around the 1870s and it was one of the small farmlets that operated in the area at that time. It now offers options for someone to live comfortably and is perfectly positioned for peace and tranquillity.
The property has two bedrooms, lounge with open fireplace, and spacious open-plan kitchen/dining room with gas plates, electric wall oven and solid fuel heater.
Laundry and bathroom with claw foot bath and vanity.
Outside is a paved brick pergola area, cottage gardens, and shed with 2 car parking spaces and a workshop area. There is a standalone studio which is a great space for your hobbies, 1.5kw solar system, plus tank water for the Cottage and a 1 meg water entitlement that feeds directly into the dam.
This is a fantastic location on the edge of the forest and at the end of the lane, with wildlife and bird life around, and just three minutes to Kangaroo Flat.
This unique Cottage has lots of history, and is well worth inspecting.
